STA.keybind.tokenImage.name: Show Token Art
STA.keybind.tokenImage.hint: Shows the token of the selected or targeted actor(s).
STA.keybind.tokenImageEveryone.name: Show Token Art to Everyone
STA.keybind.tokenImageEveryone.hint: Shows the token of the selected or targeted actor(s) to everyone.
STA.keybind.actorImage.name: Show Actor Art
STA.keybind.actorImage.hint: Shows the avatar of the selected or targeted actor(s).
STA.keybind.actorImageEveryone.name: Show Actor Art to Everyone
STA.keybind.actorImageEveryone.hint: Shows the avatar of the selected or targeted actor(s) to everyone.
